Method.name: %OnBeforeSave
Method.Implementation: set strClass="VARParametroCliente" set $piece(idKey,",",1)=i%Empresa set $piece(objRec,"~",1)=i%HabilitarPaineldeMensagen set $piece(objRec,"~",2)=i%FarmaciadeAcoesJudiciais set $piece(objRec,"~",3)=i%ValidaEstoqueRequisicao set $piece(objRec,"~",4)=i%DiasEmailAlertaValidade set $piece(objRec,"~",5)=i%UsuariosAlertaValidade set $piece(objRec,"~",6)=i%MostrarValorAlertaValidad set $piece(objRec,"~",7)=i%FaxSetorCompras set $piece(objRec,"~",8)=i%LocaisCentrais set $piece(objRec,"~",9)=i%PermitirProcMultiplosPedidos set $piece(objRec,"~",10)=i%PerfilAdministrado set $piece(objRec,"~",11)=i%UtilizaFiltrosRelatorio set $piece(objRec,"~",12)=i%LocaisAprovacao set $piece(objRec,"~",13)=i%UsuariosAlertaLicenca set $piece(objRec,"~",14)=i%ReposicaoRedeBaseadaEm set $piece(objRec,"~",15)=i%ReposicaoLocalBaseadaEm set $piece(objRec,"~",16)=i%PedidodeCompraOpcional set $piece(objRec,"~",17)=i%LocaisIntegrados set $piece(objRec,"~",18)=i%IsCoreAntigo set $piece(objRec,"~",19)=i%HabilitarIntegracao set $piece(objRec,"~",20)=i%PrazoMinimoEntregaReq set $piece(objRec,"~",21)=i%DiasEmaillAlertaValidadeA set $piece(objRec,"~",22)=i%UsuariosAlertaValidadeAta set $piece(objRec,"~",25)=i%EnviarEmailRecebimento set $piece(objRec,"~",26)=i%UsuariosAlertaRecebimento set $piece(objRec,"~",27)=i%ValorCobradoM3Estoque set $piece(objRec,"~",30)=i%ControlarValidadeAtaLinha set $piece(objRec,"~",50)=i%Criadoem set $piece(objRec,"~",51)=i%Criadopor set $piece(objRec,"~",52)=i%Alteradoem set $piece(objRec,"~",53)=i%Alteradopor set $piece(objRec,"~",54)=i%FrequenciaValidadeProduto set $piece(objRec,"~",55)=i%Diasdasemanaproduto set $piece(objRec,"~",56)=i%Diasdomesproduto set $piece(objRec,"~",57)=i%Horadeexecucaoproduto set $piece(objRec,"~",58)=i%FrequenciaValidadeAta set $piece(objRec,"~",59)=i%Diasdasemanaata set $piece(objRec,"~",60)=i%Diasdomesata set $piece(objRec,"~",61)=i%Horadeexecucaoata set $piece(objRec,"~",62)=i%CaminhoVirtualIP set $piece(objRec,"~",63)=i%LimparDadosColUser set $piece(objRec,"~",64)=i%ParticoesAMonitorar set $piece(objRec,"~",65)=i%PercMaxAceitUsoParticao set $piece(objRec,"~",66)=i%UsuariosAlertaDisco set $piece(objRec,"~",67)=i%MesSaldoInicialReceb set $piece(objRec,"~",68)=i%AnoSaldoInicialReceb set $piece(objRec,"~",69)=i%VincularPacAdmAtiva set $piece(objRec,"~",74)=i%Quantidadedelinhasnapagin set $piece(objRec,"~",75)=i%CentroCustoPadraoDoacao set $piece(objRec,"~",76)=i%RequisicaoApenasParaProdutosPa set $piece(objRec,"~",77)=i%CentroCustoPadraoArredond set $piece(objRec,"~",81)=i%IDsUsuariosPadraoLicencas set $piece(objRec,"~",82)=i%AlmoxarifadoCentral set $piece(objRec,"~",83)=i%FarmaciaCentral set $piece(objRec,"~",86)=i%FarmaciaEspecializada set $piece(objRec,"~",87)=i%FarmaciaEspecializadaSemCID set $piece(objRec,"~",88)=i%FarmaciaAltoCusto set $piece(objRec,"~",89)=i%RegionaisPainelAbast set $piece(objRec,"~",90)=i%FrequenciaPainel set $piece(objRec,"~",91)=i%Diasdasemanapainel set $piece(objRec,"~",92)=i%Diasdomespainel set $piece(objRec,"~",93)=i%Horadeexecucaopainel set $piece(objRec,"~",94)=i%Horasdodiapainel set $piece(objRec,"~",95)=i%PercentualDiferencaPrecos set $piece(objRec,"~",96)=i%TipoEstoqueJudicial set $piece(objRec,"~",97)=i%ToleranciaDosagem set $piece(objRec,"~",98)=i%ControlarAutorizacaoProdutos set $piece(objRec,"~",99)=i%FornecPadraoRecebDevoluca set $piece(objRec,"~",100)=i%CentroCustoPadraoInventario set $piece(objRec,"~",101)=i%CentroCustoPadraoDevolucao set sc=$$OnBeforeSave^COMObject(insert,strClass,idKey,.objRec) set i%HabilitarPaineldeMensagen=$piece(objRec,"~",1) set i%FarmaciadeAcoesJudiciais=$piece(objRec,"~",2) set i%ValidaEstoqueRequisicao=$piece(objRec,"~",3) set i%DiasEmailAlertaValidade=$piece(objRec,"~",4) set i%UsuariosAlertaValidade=$piece(objRec,"~",5) set i%MostrarValorAlertaValidad=$piece(objRec,"~",6) set i%FaxSetorCompras=$piece(objRec,"~",7) set i%LocaisCentrais=$piece(objRec,"~",8) set i%PermitirProcMultiplosPedidos=$piece(objRec,"~",9) set i%PerfilAdministrado=$piece(objRec,"~",10) set i%UtilizaFiltrosRelatorio=$piece(objRec,"~",11) set i%LocaisAprovacao=$piece(objRec,"~",12) set i%UsuariosAlertaLicenca=$piece(objRec,"~",13) set i%ReposicaoRedeBaseadaEm=$piece(objRec,"~",14) set i%ReposicaoLocalBaseadaEm=$piece(objRec,"~",15) set i%PedidodeCompraOpcional=$piece(objRec,"~",16) set i%LocaisIntegrados=$piece(objRec,"~",17) set i%IsCoreAntigo=$piece(objRec,"~",18) set i%HabilitarIntegracao=$piece(objRec,"~",19) set i%PrazoMinimoEntregaReq=$piece(objRec,"~",20) set i%DiasEmaillAlertaValidadeA=$piece(objRec,"~",21) set i%UsuariosAlertaValidadeAta=$piece(objRec,"~",22) set i%EnviarEmailRecebimento=$piece(objRec,"~",25) set i%UsuariosAlertaRecebimento=$piece(objRec,"~",26) set i%ValorCobradoM3Estoque=$piece(objRec,"~",27) set i%ControlarValidadeAtaLinha=$piece(objRec,"~",30) set i%Criadoem=$piece(objRec,"~",50) set i%Criadopor=$piece(objRec,"~",51) set i%Alteradoem=$piece(objRec,"~",52) set i%Alteradopor=$piece(objRec,"~",53) set i%FrequenciaValidadeProduto=$piece(objRec,"~",54) set i%Diasdasemanaproduto=$piece(objRec,"~",55) set i%Diasdomesproduto=$piece(objRec,"~",56) set i%Horadeexecucaoproduto=$piece(objRec,"~",57) set i%FrequenciaValidadeAta=$piece(objRec,"~",58) set i%Diasdasemanaata=$piece(objRec,"~",59) set i%Diasdomesata=$piece(objRec,"~",60) set i%Horadeexecucaoata=$piece(objRec,"~",61) set i%CaminhoVirtualIP=$piece(objRec,"~",62) set i%LimparDadosColUser=$piece(objRec,"~",63) set i%ParticoesAMonitorar=$piece(objRec,"~",64) set i%PercMaxAceitUsoParticao=$piece(objRec,"~",65) set i%UsuariosAlertaDisco=$piece(objRec,"~",66) set i%MesSaldoInicialReceb=$piece(objRec,"~",67) set i%AnoSaldoInicialReceb=$piece(objRec,"~",68) set i%VincularPacAdmAtiva=$piece(objRec,"~",69) set i%Quantidadedelinhasnapagin=$piece(objRec,"~",74) set i%CentroCustoPadraoDoacao=$piece(objRec,"~",75) set i%RequisicaoApenasParaProdutosPa=$piece(objRec,"~",76) set i%CentroCustoPadraoArredond=$piece(objRec,"~",77) set i%IDsUsuariosPadraoLicencas=$piece(objRec,"~",81) set i%AlmoxarifadoCentral=$piece(objRec,"~",82) set i%FarmaciaCentral=$piece(objRec,"~",83) set i%FarmaciaEspecializada=$piece(objRec,"~",86) set i%FarmaciaEspecializadaSemCID=$piece(objRec,"~",87) set i%FarmaciaAltoCusto=$piece(objRec,"~",88) set i%RegionaisPainelAbast=$piece(objRec,"~",89) set i%FrequenciaPainel=$piece(objRec,"~",90) set i%Diasdasemanapainel=$piece(objRec,"~",91) set i%Diasdomespainel=$piece(objRec,"~",92) set i%Horadeexecucaopainel=$piece(objRec,"~",93) set i%Horasdodiapainel=$piece(objRec,"~",94) set i%PercentualDiferencaPrecos=$piece(objRec,"~",95) set i%TipoEstoqueJudicial=$piece(objRec,"~",96) set i%ToleranciaDosagem=$piece(objRec,"~",97) set i%ControlarAutorizacaoProdutos=$piece(objRec,"~",98) set i%FornecPadraoRecebDevoluca=$piece(objRec,"~",99) set i%CentroCustoPadraoInventario=$piece(objRec,"~",100) set i%CentroCustoPadraoDevolucao=$piece(objRec,"~",101) Quit sc
